ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( AND( ISNEW(), $Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity' ),
OR( OR( PSR_Reference_Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity', PSR_Reference_Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity_read_only' ), OR( PSR_Reference_Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Read_Only', PSR_Reference_Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Read_Only_Indirect' ), OR( ISPICKVAL( PSR_Reference_Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Identify Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL( PSR_Reference_Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Completed') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot create a Pre-Sales Risk Opportunity from another Pre-Sales Risk Opportunity or from a Sales Opportunity, that is either in the Identify, Closed or Cancelled stage.
